page.title: 09Some Heathylee Farms
page.content:
The house that I did a survey on was Bradshaw Farm. There were three dogs and some kaid lambs. It was all soil going to the door. The owner was a local builder.
Then I went to High Ash Farm. They had two dogs. High Ash is a butcher's. They have a lot of sheep, a lot of big sheds and they have new gates.
At Smallshaw they have just put up two new sheds and a waggon port. They are having 120 horses. They have new gates and they have grazing fields. The road to Smallshaw is very rough and bumpy and the stones are out of place.
